item.title: The Love Remedy
item.description: I noped out hard at the kiss during a panic attack(!!!), and it never won me back. I did skim through the rest to find out whodunnit, which means I was annoyed by whodunnit (itâ€™s just nonsensical based on the characterization within the book!
